about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary football journey with Dream Sports Platform - an immersive open-world action RPG that goes beyond the football simulator.

Progress through levels, shape your character, and unlock rewards that bridge the gap between virtual triumphs and real-world football services.


Powered by Unreal Engine 5, our platform offers cutting-edge visuals and gameplay, setting new standards for football gaming realism.



Experience a narrative-driven Story Mode that unfolds your character's path from a passionate newcomer to a devoted fan, navigating the highs and lows of the football world. Create the future of the football fan you'd like to be!


Explore meticulously designed stadium areas, each with a unique atmosphere. Take part in side quests and quizzes, and discover hidden attractions throughout the game world. Team up with friends to dive into the vibrant energy of the streets filled with fans worldwide.


Explore the photorealistic and interactive, digitized stadium and infrastructure of partner football clubs. Be engaged with its unique quests and immerse yourself in its rich history and culture.


Personalize your avatar with an extensive range of cosmetic items. From official team kits and accessories to unique fan gear, express your individuality and football style. Upgrade your character's skills through a progressive skill tree.


Acquire virtual coins through in-game achievements, character development, and completing quests. Purchase player items such as customized jerseys, unique equipment, and exclusive in-game merchandise. Exchange in-game rewards for real-world services, including match tickets, fan experiences, and club memberships.


By exchanging virtual coins for real-world services, users unlock additional in-game rewards, creating a symbiotic relationship between the virtual and real football experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 47 GB available space
